_ITEM_._MBI_BACKUPWARN_: BACK UP DON'T PUT OUT USB DISK
_ITEM_._MBI_FORMATUSBLOSTDATA_: IT WILL LOSS DATA AFTER FORMAT !
_ITEM_._MBI_SYSTEMUPDATEINFO_: DO NOT PULL OUT USB DISK!
_ITEM_._MBI_HDDFIRSTUSE_: NO HDD AVAILABLE,CLICK OK TO FORMAT FIRST !
_ITEM_._MBI_SHUTOFFMACHINEASK_: ARE YOU SURE TO SHUT OFF ?
_ITEM_._MBI_POWEROFF_: NOW YOU CAN POWER OFF SAFELY !
_ITEM_._MBI_OSDCHANGE_: THE OSD DISPLAY WILL BE CHANGED TO %s OUTPUT
_ITEM_._MBI_DATEDURATIONERROR_: DATE DURATION MUST LESS THAN 7 DAYS !
_ITEM_._MBI_NODEVICEFOUND_: NO STORAGE DEVICE TO BE FOUND !

_BUTTON_._COMMENT_: DETAILED RECORD LIST / BACK UP VIDEO

_QUERYTABLE_._COMMENT_: RED: ALARM RECORD GREEN: NORMAL RECORD
CLICK ON THE GRID TO PLAY THE VIDEO

_DROPDOWNLIST_._COMMENT_: OVERWRITE VIDEO DATA AFTER INDICATED TIME
BUZZER IF HDD LOSS OR NOT ENOUGH SPACE
ALARM IF HDD LOSS OR NOT ENOUGH SPACE

_BUTTON_._COMMENT_: SYSTEM WILL RESTART IF LANGUAGE CHANGED

_DROPDOWNLIST_._COMMENT_: NO: NORMAL OPEN NC: NORMAL CLOSE
NO: NORMAL OPEN NC: NORMAL CLOSE
